profile.name: Andrej
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Building Large Language Models and Automating Research Discoveries at Netflix
profile.summary: Highly motivated software engineer with expertise in natural language processing, machine learning, and database systems. Proven track record of building scalable solutions and automating complex tasks.
profile.company:
Based on the provided information, I would recommend Netflix as the most realistic employer for Andrej.

Netflix

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Designed and implemented large language models using transformer architectures, achieving state-of-the-art results in various NLP benchmarks.
Developed and deployed a web interface for arxiv submissions, improving user experience and reducing manual effort.
Created tools like rustbpe and nanochat, demonstrating expertise in natural language processing and machine learning.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed open-source projects on GitHub, including a popular transformer-based model for NLP tasks.
Collaborated with researchers to automate research publications discovery and analysis, improving productivity and accuracy.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained the arxiv.org web interface, ensuring high availability and performance.
Contributed to the development of new features and bug fixes, demonstrating expertise in database systems.

points: Natural Language Processing (NLP) with transformer architectures
Machine Learning with scikit-learn and TensorFlow
